name: Primit Shooter
description:
This is a first-game for us using godot engine.

It's a simple and light twin-stick-shooter using WASD and mouse.

you aim for game clear while beating various primitive-design enemies.

We used:

  • PixelMplus12-Regular.ttf
    • https://itouhiro.hatenablog.com/entry/20130602/font
  • Sound
    • 効果音ラボ
